tidbits.title: Breathtaking Landscapes
tidbits.description: Uganda is known as the 'Pearl of Africa' for its stunning landscapes, including the diverse terrains of savannas, mountains, lakes, and the source of the Nile River.

tidbits.title: Rich Wildlife
tidbits.description: The country hosts diverse wildlife, with famous national parks like Queen Elizabeth, Murchison Falls, and Bwindi Impenetrable Forest, home to mountain gorillas.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Uganda's cultural richness is evident in its various ethnic groups, each with distinct traditions, music, dance, and languages, contributing to its vibrant heritage.
